description.value:
Adventuring Gear

A camtono is a secured, handle container used for transporting valuable goods. A camtono comes with one key. Without the key, unlocking the camtono requires a DC 24 security kit to force open. It stores 8 lb., not exceeding 3/8 cubic foot, has an AC of 13, and 60 hit points. Destroying the camtono risks damaging any goods stored inside.

Â 

Camtono

A camtono is a secured, handle container used for transporting valuable goods. A camtono comes with one key. Without the key, unlocking the camtono requires a DC 15 security kit to force open. It stores 5 lb., not exceeding 1/4 cubic foot, has an AC of 10, and 15 hit points. Destroying the camtono risks damaging any goods stored inside.
